content: The §6Electric Blast Furnace§r is one of the main Multiblock Structures in Gregtech, and the main goal of earlygame progression.
Like all Gregtech Multiblocks, this structure is modular, and can be made up of many different combinations of Multiblock Parts.

The §6Electric Blast Furnace§r can form with any combination of blocks above. For example, if the desired recipe does not deal with fluids, neither of the fluid related hatches are required.

Overclocking the Blast Furnace is as simple as ensuring the the Multiblock has 2 Energy Inputs, so 4 Amps of energy can be received, which will ensure that the mutliblock runs at the tier above the energy inputs.

For the Blast Furnace specifically, the Muffler Hatch needs to be placed at the center of the top layer, and must face upwards.

The §3Electric Blast Furnace§r, §3Pyrolyse Oven, §3Multi Smelter§r, and §3Cracking Unit§r all require heating Coils. But what are the advantages of using higher tier coils?

The latter three are quite straightforward. Higher tier coils reduce the §eprocessing time§r of the Pyrolyse Oven, reduce the §9energy usage§r of the Cracking Unit, and increase the §anumber of parallel smelts§r and reduce the §9energy usage§r of the Multi Smelter.

For the EBF, things get slightly more complicated. The EBF smelts items at a certain §dtemperature§r. This is mainly determined by the tier of heating coil used - §r§6Cupronickel§r is §d1800K§r, §bKanthal§r is §d2700K§r, etc. Additionally, starting from §6HV§r, each tier of energy adds §d100K§r to the temperature.

Each EBF recipe has a certain base temperature, for example, §bAluminium§r is smelted at §d1700K§r. If the EBF temperature is not high enough, the recipe can't be done. If the EBF temperature is high enough, 2 different bonuses are applied:
§9-§r For every §d900K§r above the recipe temperature, the amount of energy required is multiplied by §a0.95x§r, which stacks.
§9-§r For every §d1800K§r above the recipe temperature, one additional overclock will be §6100% efficient§r; in other words, it will §5quadruple the speed§r, instead of doubling it.
Maintence Hatch. Required based on Config. Exactly 1
